title: Multilingual Short Works Collection 040 - Poetry & Prose
description:
This is our 40th collection of short pieces, poetry or prose, fiction and non-fiction, in several different languages (except standard English) as listed below. All chosen and recorded by Librivox volunteers. - Summary by ToddHW 1. Chinese - 感恩節的生活紀實 [gan en jie de shenghuo jishi] - 8:02 Liang Shih-Qiu (梁實秋)
link to text
Keywords: Thanksgiving, turkey, fortune, candy, hunger 2. Chinese - 心經 [xinjing] - 2:26
Unknown author
link to text
Keywords: Heart Sutra, Heart, Enlightenment, Suffering, Form, Emptiness, Senses, Awareness, Mantra, Xuanzang, 玄奘 3. Dutch - Kennis I - 01:12
